title: Language Education Course Utilizing Intelligent Scaffolding in Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening practical application skills for in-service professionals through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can integrate and analyze relevant media resources in real-time during discussions using concept mapping tools in collaborative learning environments.
Learners can systematically apply reasoning processes required in language learning through intelligent scaffolding (gradual hints, post-hoc explanations).
Learners can complete language project deliverables that incorporate peer feedback through modeling-coaching-reflection stages.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
